overview:
Arun K. Veluchamy serves as President of Vmark, the parent company of Creative Automation. Arun oversees all of the day-to-day operations at Creative Automation and also coordinates all of the sales between the Vmark companies.

Arun graduated from Purdue University in 2000 with a major in Management and in 2008 with an MBA at Northwestern University’s Kellogg School of Management.

“Having these certifications in place not only allows us to do something positive for the environment, but they also give us the ability to offer our clients more options when it comes to accomplishing their own green initiatives,” stated Arun Veluchamy, President of Creative Automation.

“Positioning all of our companies under the Vmark name gives us a single identification point with our customers,” said Arun Veluchamy, Vice President of Creative Automation and son of company founders Pethinaidu and Parameswari Veluchamy.”Our family has more than 30 years of experience in the direct marketing industry, and it remains our goal to provide a one-stop-shopping experience for our direct marketing customers,” said Arun.
